QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct patient_state, cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) zip, coalesce(patient_state, '') + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value FROM {sc}.medical_claims union SELECT distinct patient_state, cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) zip, coalesce(patient_state, '') + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value FROM {sc}.pharmacy_claims union SELECT distinct patient_state, cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) zip, coalesce(patient_state, '') + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value FROM {sc}.lab
